category.term: 71~Copy Kate~Kate Beckinsale~Sephora USA Inc.~Stila Cosmetics Inc.
category.label: InformQString

content.div:
After taking some time off Kate Beckinsale is prepared to return to the spotlight in 2012 with a list of big name movies hitting theatres. This month starts off our love affair with Kate when she hits the big screen in Contraband with Mark Wahlberg and then she reprises her role of vampiress Selene in Underworld Awakening. Despite her absences, we never forgot our love of Kate's natural beauty. Copy Kate's clean makeup and long shiny hair to start your year off right too.




Get Kate Beckinsale's natural beauty with these items:

1. Alterna Bamboo Smooth Kendi Dry Oil Mist, Sephora, $24.00 – Protect your hair from damage, while controlling frizz and flyways, so your natural look is controlled.

2. Yves Rocher Curl Extender Mascara, $7.00 – Get extreme length without making your lashes too dramatic with a curl enhancing mascara.

3. Chanel Aqualumiere Gloss, Perfume Worldwide, $36.71 – Copy Kate's pretty pout with a high shine pink gloss.

4. Maybelline Fit Me Bronzer, Ulta, $4.99 – Fake a sunkissed glow even in the winter with a bronzer to suit your skin tone.

5. Smudge Stick Waterproof Eye Liner, Stila Cosmetics, $20.00 – With this natural look, keep your eye makeup simple with a neutral brown liner.

6. Charlotte Ronson A Perfect Mess Beach Hair Spray, Sephora, $20.00 – If you aren't blessed with beachy waves, fake them with this hair spray.


For more daily news, trend reports and 'get the looks' in Fashion, Beauty and Celebrity Style visit realstylenetwork.com

Read the latest issue www.realstylemag.com

Follow Real Style Network on Twitter at @realstylenet

entry.title: Celebrity Beauty Secrets

link.Abstract: We've got the inside scoop on how to get the stars' favourite looks. Find out how they get picture-perfect for the cameras.
link.title: [ more ]

link.Abstract: Want to get picture perfect bronzed cheeks? Jennifer Lopez's makeup artist, Scott Barnes, told InStyle magazine to be careful where you apply the dust. He said, "No powder around laugh lines, nose, or eyes; it adds darkness and ages you."
link.title: Jennifer Lopez - Celebrity Beauty Secrets

entry.title: Celebrity Makeup Mishaps

link.Abstract: We're used to stars looking glamorous and perfect, but sometimes it just doesn't happen. Check out some classic makeup mistakes made by the rich and famous.
link.title: [ more ]

link.Abstract: Christina Aguilera's heartfelt performance at Etta James' funeral on Jan. 28, 2012 was overshadowed by her dirrty legs. Streaks of what appeared to be fake tanner ran down the side and front of both her legs.
